storyContext.summary: Initialize the backend using the Agno agent-api starter to provide a FastAPI foundation with agent scaffolding. Ensure dependencies can be installed with uv and the structure is aligned to the architecture decisions.

requirements.acceptanceCriteria: Run `uv sync` in backend to install deps.
Include Agno v2.3.21 and FastAPI in pyproject.toml.

constraints.constraint: Python 3.11+ with uv for dependency management.
